name: interview-fullstack-project
description: Fullstack interview project for Dynatrace candidates

scripts.test: cd client && npm run test:no-watch && cd ../server && npm run test
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client/ && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start:db" "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"

author: Dynatrace Detroit Lab
